topic.title: How to keep a site as small as possible?
topic.body:
Hello, I wan't to make a "forum" style site; but I don't want it to becomes too big... so my idea is automatically remove all the old topics / messages (1 month old topics, for example). 

Is it possible to achieve this witouth a PHP/Python cron, using only the ZeroNet functionalities? or I'll need to make a cron? 

Thanks

1_1E1PGsCSCNzkP8xmx8awJ2hho3cPdsN4FF.body: Saluton karaj ! Cxu vi konas retpagxojn en EO? Dankon :)
